page.title: 11FAMILY FUN DAY,SACRED HEART
page.content: Family Fun Day run by the St.Vincent de Paul Society was a great success. { There were 21 events .Besides the {usual sprinting,egg'n'spoon,3-legged, {wheel barrow,and sack race,there were 5 unusual events- Tossing The Sheaf, Black Pudding Throwing, Pea-pushing, Weight-throwing and The Greasy Pole. { Tossing the sheaf attracted alot of {attention.This event was won with a {vertical throw of 8 foot 6 inches. } In the Black Pudding event everyone had a great laugh,when the pan handle broke and the pudding disintegrated! { For The Greasy Pole, a telegraph pole {was greased and Â£10 prize was put on {top. No one succeeded until someone {had an idea! Why not stand on some- {ones shoulders!}He did -and shared the prize with his 3 grateful helpers!
